title: Handcrafted Eco cottage ‚Ä¢ Pool Kitchen Ocean Views
summary:
üåøMANA 1üåø

Peaceful one-bedroom villa with ocean and mountain views in the hills of Jungut Batu. 

MANA 1 blends natural design, comfort, and privacy ‚Äî ideal for couples or solo travelers. Enjoy a private pool, open living, and views of Mount Agung.

The space
üåøMana Boutique Cottages - MANA 1üåø

Peaceful Villa Hideaway with Ocean Views in Jungut Batu

MANA 1 Boutique Cottage is a newly opened, charming one-bedroom located in the Bukit area of Jungut Batu. Purposefully designed for couples and solo travelers seeking peace, privacy, and a touch of luxury, Mana offers the ideal escape from Bali‚Äôs busy tourist zones.

Crafted from recycled wood and decorated in soft whites with natural textures, the cottage blends sustainability with island elegance. Every detail ‚Äî from the locally sourced furnishings to the semi-outdoor bathroom ‚Äî is thoughtfully designed to create a warm and relaxing atmosphere.

Mana Boutique Cottage includes:

‚úîÔ∏èA cozy one-bedroom layout

‚úîÔ∏èA stylish semi-outdoor bathroom

‚úîÔ∏èAn open-plan living and dining area

‚úîÔ∏èA refreshing private swimming pool

‚úîÔ∏èHammock overlooking the coast line of Jungut Batu Beach

‚úîÔ∏èStunning views of Mount Agung and ocean surf breaks right from your bedroom

By day, enjoy sun-drenched lounging and gentle ocean breezes. By night, Mana transforms into a calm, intimate hideaway perfect for unwinding under the stars.

üìç Location: Just a 5-minute scooter ride to Coconut Beach and Jungutbatu‚Äôs vibrant eat street, you're close to both relaxation and local life.

‚ö†Ô∏è Please Note:
Mana Boutique Cottage is currently available at a discounted rate due to a nearby construction project. While we‚Äôre working with the contractor to minimize disruption, some noise may occur during the day. We truly appreciate your understanding and patience.

Ideal for:
Honeymooners ‚Ä¢ Couples ‚Ä¢ Solo Travelers ‚Ä¢ Friends traveling together (book Mana 2)

Seeking a peaceful, stylish, and sustainable island experience

üîëThis listing is ONLY for MANA 1. 
MANA 1 is completely private and self-contained but if you‚Äôre booking both MANA 1 & MANA 2 or staying as a group, please notify us in advance. Our cottages include the option to unlock adjoining doors, providing seamless access between both properties ‚Äî for those who want to stay connected while still having their own space.

üìéTo book MANA 2, please click on the link below:

location: Entire home in Nusa Lembongan, Indonesia

Services: Housekeeping available 2 hours a day, every day

reviews.text: 10/10 - Would highly recommend this place to stay while in Nusa lembongan. Villa was extremely clean with beautiful scenery. Service was excellent with a mini fridge full of goodies. Putu organised a scooter rental which was dropped to our door and also organised our laundry to be dry cleaned (also picked up from and dropped back to our villa), both at great rates! Helped organise a taxi service to and from boat and helped us with our luggage on the beach. Hands down best place we stayed while travelling around Bali

Mana officially has a special place in my heart. Waking up to the most incredible view of Mt Agung and the ocean was so dreamy, surf checks of shipwrecks from the hammock‚Ä¶ so hard to leave !! This location is literally the perfect balance of staying out of the hustle and bustle, while also being so close to restaurants and the beach. This stay was exactly what I needed! See you soon Mana, thanks for having me x

What a perfect stay at Mana üòç 
Everything was truly five-star: the beautiful wooden bungalow, the incredibly comfortable bed, the lovely view (even better from the hammock up top), the open-air bathroom stocked with Sensatia products and of course, the pool. It was such a peaceful and relaxing spot. There was a bit of distant construction noise at one point, but nothing disruptive. I only wish I could have stayed longer üåû

We loved our stay! The villa is very modern and in a very quiet setting, we didn‚Äôt have any issues with noise from the nearby building sites. 
Putu was amazing and made the whole experience flawless, he helped arrange ferry‚Äôs and taxis which was definitely worthwhile as our flight was delayed so the ferry had to be rearranged. He also organised a scooter for us and delivered it to the villa. He made everything very easy.
We would definitely stay again.

Wow such a beautiful place! I‚Äôve been to nusa Lembongan many times over the years and this was the best place I‚Äôve stayed. From the moment I checked in I was met with beautiful views and amenities. The staff was so kind and helped with any questions I had. Can‚Äôt wait to come back

What a lovely little find, the cottage is set up on the hill and comes with outstanding views of the island, ocean and over to bali. 
The place is beautifully decorated and equipped with everything you‚Äôd need. I loved all of the small touches that really made it feel homey. We would‚Äôve stayed far longer if we could and will come back. 
Staff were amazing and the place is spotlessly clean. Super comfy beds and quiet atmosphere meant we had the best night sleep in weeks. 
Would highly recommend, our highlight is  watching the sunrise over Mt Agung.

We had a lovely night stay at Mana! Everything was clean and thoughtfully designed in the space. The best part was  the amazing view of the surf and the private swimming pool. We‚Äôll be back for sure!

Very cool place. I was really blown away by the view and how peaceful the location was.  The top of the hill is quiet and stunning. I slept like a baby ..not sure if it was the bed or the binnies by the pool.  Overall epic experience. Coming back here for sure.
Had an amazing stay, the location of this cozy cottage is very nice and offers a breathtaking view, all went smoothly and was very easy ! I will come back for sure.

Perfect place for a stay in lembongan. Beautiful villa, stunning views, amazing staff. 
It‚Äôs quiet and peaceful but only a few minutes from the Main Street, restaraunts, and beaches. 
Can‚Äôt recommend enough!
